<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_step"><sys_atf_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><copied_from/><description>Run Server Side Validation Script</description><display_name>Run Server Side Script</display_name><inputs/><mugshots_cache_json/><notes>Number of UI Actions available for x_402400_drink_orders form has not changed</notes><order>9</order><snapshot/><step_config display_value="Run Server Side Script">41de4a935332120028bc29cac2dc349a</step_config><sys_class_name>sys_atf_step</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-27 20:44:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>c41a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb5a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run Server Side Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Drink" source="x_402400_drink">0cc0d4901b1101106c166464604bcbd2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Drink">0cc0d4901b1101106c166464604bcbd2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_step_c41a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb5a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-28 02:25:37</sys_updated_on><table/><test display_value="Environment">8d6298141b1101106c166464604bcbba</test><timeout/><warning_message/></sys_atf_step><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=c41a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb5a"/><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>c41a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb5a</document_key><order>200</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-27 20:44:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>181a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb64</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-27 20:44:02</sys_updated_on><value>(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual) {
    describe('Count of sys_ui_action records', function() {
        it('has not change since tests were created', function() {
            var gaSysUiAction = new GlideAggregate('sys_ui_action');
            gaSysUiAction.addEncodedQuery('tableINx_402400_drink_orders^ORtable=task^ORtable=global');
            gaSysUiAction.addQuery('form_action', '=', 'true');
            gaSysUiAction.addAggregate('COUNT');
            gaSysUiAction.query();
            var expected = '35';
            var count = 0;
            if (gaSysUiAction.next()) {
                count = gaSysUiAction.getAggregate('COUNT');
            }
            expect(count).toBe(expected);
        });
    });
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);
jasmine.getEnv().execute();</value><variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><document>sys_atf_step</document><document_key>c41a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb5a</document_key><order>100</order><sys_class_name>sys_variable_value</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-01-27 20:44:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>541a5eb91b1501106c166464604bcb64</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-01-27 20:44:02</sys_updated_on><value>3.1</value><variable display_value="Jasmine version">42f2564b73031300440211d8faf6a777</variable></sys_variable_value></record_update>
